akas: 2 Broke Girls - Pleite in Brooklyn Germany (première title)
NY Bonbi Girl Japan (English title) (literal English title)
Dos chicas sin blanca Spain (Castilian title)
akas from release info: 2 Broke Girls - Pleite in Brooklyn Germany (première title)
NY Bonbi Girl Japan (English title) (literal English title)
Dos chicas sin blanca Spain (Castilian title)

1.title: And the Two Openings: Part One
1.plot: Max copes with the aftermath of her breakup with Randy, as the finishing touches are made on their new Dessert Bar; Sophie and Oleg prepare for the baby's birth.

2.title: And the Two Openings: Part Two

3.title: And the 80's Movie
3.plot: Max and Caroline plan to attract a more sophisticated clientele to their dessert bar, until a team of arm wrestlers become their latest patron; Oleg helps Max write sexy messages to Randy.

4.title: And the Godmama Drama
4.plot: Oleg and Sophie plan to have Max and Caroline as their baby's godparents, until Oleg's domineering mother arrives, and fires the girls from their godmother duties.

5.title: And the College Experience
5.plot: Max gives Caroline the party experience she never had when they're invited to speak about their business at the University of Pennsylvania.

6.title: And the Rom-Commie
6.plot: Earl's long lost sweetheart from Cuba visits and asks him to take her on a tour of the country.

7.title: And the Sophie Doll
7.plot: The girls take a bartending class to add cocktails to their menu; Sophie creates a creepy lookalike video monitor doll to keep tabs on her baby.

8.title: And the Duck Stamp
8.plot: Max and Caroline's dessert bar business booms after hiring a popular bartender; Han becomes addicted to the mixologist's potent cocoa powder, and enters a stamping-drawing contest.

9.title: And the About FaceTime
9.plot: Randy sets Caroline up with one of his co-workers when he and Max get tired of her being a third wheel on their FaceTime dates.

10.title: And the Himmicane
10.plot: When a hurricane hits, Caroline is worried that a divorce party she's planning for a wealthy couple will be ruined with the pair stuck in the dessert bar during the storm.

11.title: And the Planes, Fingers and Automobiles
11.plot: Max and Caroline take a cross-country road trip to Los Angeles so Max can win back Randy.

12.title: And the Riverboat Runs Through It
12.plot: Max and Caroline end up on a riverboat going to New Orleans when Max tries to reach Randy in Texas.

13.title: And the Stalking Dead
13.plot: Max and Caroline are cast as zombie extras when they reach the movie set in Texas where Randy is working.

14.title: And the Emergency Contractor
14.plot: When Max and Caroline get home from their road trip, Caroline discovers she likes the dessert bar renovations as much as she likes Bobby (Christopher Gorham), the contractor on the job. Also, Max rushes to Randy's side when she hears he's in the hospital in New York City, and Sophie joins a mommy group that cares more about partying than baby talk.

15.title: And the Turtle Sense
15.plot: Caroline is excited about her first date with Bobby, until she realizes that Max will be left in charge of the dessert bar.

16.title: And the Tease Time
16.plot: Caroline decides to take a burlesque class to spice things up with Bobby, while Max decides to give up sex altogether.

17.title: And the Jessica Shmessica
17.plot: Caroline and Max meet Bobby's family and discover that they still haven't gotten over Bobby's ex-girlfriend Jessica.

18.title: And the Dad Day Afternoon
18.plot: Han tracks down Max's birth father and the diner gang travel to Long Island to meet him.

19.title: And the Baby and Other Things
19.plot: Caroline and Bobby have their first Fight when she encourages his sister to quit her job at the family company.

20.title: And the Alley-Oops
20.plot: Caroline discovers Bobby's secret obsession with Bowling and a new romance flares with Max and Bobby's bowling team-mate Frank.

21.title: And the Rock Me on the Dais
21.plot: Caroline runs into her ex-boyfriend Candy Andy while she and Max attend a press junket promoting a movie about Caroline's life.

22.title: And 2 Broke Girls: The Movie
22.plot: The girls face big decisions about their future as the film about Caroline's life makes its premiere.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Experienced waitress Max meets her new co-worker, former rich-girl Caroline, who team up for a new business venture.

2.title: And the Break-Up Scene
2.plot: Caroline thinks she's doing Max a favor when she takes it upon herself to facilitate her break-up with Robbie.

3.title: And Strokes of Goodwill
3.plot: Max introduces Caroline to the art of thrift store shopping, which takes a dangerous turn when a battle erupts over a T-shirt.

4.title: And the Rich People Problems
4.plot: Max gets a glimpse at Caroline's former life of luxury when she decides to get her much-needed bite guard from her old home.

5.title: And the '90s Horse Party
5.plot: Caroline and Max throw a 90's themed party, hoping to raise money.

6.title: And the Disappearing Bed
6.plot: Caroline tries to build a Murphy bed for herself in Max's apartment. Meanwhile, the chemistry between Max and Johnny heats up.

7.title: And the Pretty Problem
7.plot: Caroline enrolls herself and Max in a cake-decorating class to increase their skill level and take their cupcake business to the next level.

8.title: And Hoarder Culture
8.plot: Caroline and Max are waist-deep in clutter when they clean a hoarder's apartment to make extra money; Max learns that Johnny has been keeping a secret.

9.title: And the Really Petty Cash
9.plot: Johnny's girlfriend has a devious plan in mind when she hires Max and Caroline to bake cupcakes for an art show featuring his work.

10.title: And the Very Christmas Thanksgiving
10.plot: Caroline and Max spend Caroline's first broke holiday season working at a department store's Santaland to earn extra money.

11.title: And the Reality Check
11.plot: Max and Caroline try to find Chestnut a job in order to get him lodging for the winter. Meanwhile, Peach, the mother of the twins Max babysits, auditions for "Real Housewives of TriBeCa."

12.title: And the Pop-Up Sale
12.plot: When Max's stove breaks, Caroline tries to return some expensive rings to Barney's department store, but discovers her surname is no longer an asset at her former home away from home.

13.title: And the Secret Ingredient
13.plot: In the midst of her new obsession with couponing, Caroline discovers the secret ingredient to Max's cupcakes.

14.title: And the Upstairs Neighbor
14.plot: Max and Caroline are suspicious of the new upstairs neighbor who moves in after the old tenant dies.

15.title: And the Blind Spot
15.plot: Max and Caroline must prove their cleaning skills to Sophie in order to be hired as maids for her cleaning business.

16.title: And the Broken Hearts
16.plot: Max shows her softer side after seeing Sophie dressed up sends Earl to the hospital with a heart attack. Meanwhile, Caroline attempts to rekindle an old flame of hers.

17.title: And the Kosher Cupcakes
17.plot: Max tries to pass off her cupcakes as kosher when she and Caroline serve them at a boy's Bar Mitzvah.

18.title: And the One-Night Stands
18.plot: Max joins Caroline on a trip to visit her father in prison.

19.title: And the Spring Break
19.plot: Max and Caroline take a spring getaway at a couple's posh apartment where they've been asked to dog-sit.

20.title: And the Drug Money
20.plot: In an effort to raise money to help Caroline's father, Max convinces Caroline to partake in a clinical drug trial.

21.title: And the Messy Purse Smackdown
21.plot: Caroline promises to drop Earl's tax return in the mail, but gets sidetracked helping Max file hers.

22.title: And the Big Buttercream Breakthrough
22.plot: Max's babysitting gig with Peach is in peril if the cupcakes she and Caroline deliver to Peach's socialite friend aren't perfect.

23.title: And Martha Stewart Have a Ball: Part 1
23.plot: Max and Caroline plan to attend a big fashion gala at the Metropolitan Museum of Art where Martha Stewart is scheduled to be a guest, in an attempt to have her taste their cupcakes and get her seal of approval.

24.title: And Martha Stewart Have a Ball: Part 2
24.plot: After Sophie helps them get proper evening clothing, the girls are forced to ride Chestnut to the ball when Oleg's car breaks down. They are stymied by the same party planner who rejected them in Part 1, as Caroline is not on the list. Max, however, comes up with a plan to sneak in. Han reveals that he used to be a jockey.

1.title: And the Hidden Stash
1.plot: Max and Caroline go to visit Caroline's father in prison where he tells them about secret stash hidden in Caroline's horse-riding trophy.

2.title: And the Pearl Necklace
2.plot: The girls are really stressed about Martha Stewart not getting back to them on their cupcake business, so they decide to hunt her down one more time.

3.title: And the Hold-Up
3.plot: The employees at The Williamsburg Diner see Han in a new light after the restaurant gets robbed.

4.title: And the Cupcake War
4.plot: Max and Caroline decide to participate in TV show where they have a chance to win money by making cupcakes. Something that seems pretty easy to do turns out to be a huge disaster.

5.title: And the Pre-Approved Credit Card
5.plot: A new pre-approved credit card causes strife between Max and Caroline; Earl's estranged son, Darius, arrives in New York with hopes of becoming a comedian.

6.title: And the Candy Manwich
6.plot: A handsome owner of a candy store is sweet on Caroline, but she's too embarrassed to see him after a humiliating experience in his store.

7.title: And the Three Boys with Wood
7.plot: Caroline can't seem to get Andy more interested once he finds out she's a Channing; Max brings home two Amish teens and offers them a place to stay in exchange for them building Chestnut a barn.

8.title: And the Egg Special
8.plot: Max and Caroline cook up a surprising fund raising solution when a potential storefront for Max's Homemade Cupcakes becomes available for rent.

9.title: And the New Boss
9.plot: Max is conflicted over her new role as a boss when she and Caroline hire an intern (ABBY ELLIOTT - Saturday Night Live) to help get their new cupcake shop ready to open.

10.title: And the Big Opening
10.plot: Max and Caroline host a grand opening celebration at their new cupcake shop, and Max invites her former flames to show off her success.

11.title: And the Silent Partner
11.plot: When Max invites Sophie to become a silent partner in the cupcake business, Caroline and Sophie quickly clash on their vision for the company. RYAN HANSEN guest stars as Andy.

12.title: And the High Holidays
12.plot: Desperate for a way to pay their overdue rent, Max and Caroline get involved with a group of sketchy customers willing to pay top dollar for their cupcakes. Recurring guest star RYAN HANSEN appears as Andy.

13.title: And the Bear Truth
13.plot: A relaxing getaway for two becomes an awkward vacation for three when Max, Caroline and Andy spend a weekend together in a cabin in the woods.

14.title: And Too Little Sleep
14.plot: Max and Caroline enlist the gang from the diner to help them bake throughout the night in order to fulfill a giant cupcake order.

15.title: And the Psychic Shakedown
15.plot: After discovering that Candy Andy closed up his shop following their breakup, Caroline visits a psychic for a reading about her future love life.

16.title: And Just Plane Magic
16.plot: Max meets a guy who works for a record label who becomes so smitten with her that he offers to fly her and Caroline to Los Angeles for the Grammys on a private plane.

17.title: And the Broken Hip
17.plot: Max and Caroline pay a high price for attempting to remove a street performer away from the entry to their cupcake shop.

18.title: And Not-So-Sweet Charity
18.plot: Max and Caroline try to get a loan from Caroline's callous aunt when they find themselves in danger of losing their cupcake shop and get an eviction notice.

19.title: And the Temporary Distraction
19.plot: When the girls take office temp jobs, Caroline tries to climb the corporate ladder and Max finds herself being hit on by the boss.

20.title: And the Big Hole
20.plot: An angry Han fires Caroline after she shows up late to work and insults the diner. Meanwhile, Oleg gets his apartment redecorated to impress Sophie.

21.title: And the Worst Selfie Ever
21.plot: Caroline contacts ex-boyfriend Andy and invites him over for casual sex, however she gets a lot more than she bargained for. Meanwhile, Max helps Han after a bad online dating experience.

22.title: And the Extra Work
22.plot: Max and Caroline are invited to be extras on a popular TV show shooting a scene in Han's diner, but when Caroline catches the director's eye, he offers her an actual role - with strings attached.

23.title: And the Tip Slip
23.plot: Caroline's father, Martin Channing, asks Caroline to go on a talk show to defend him when a former employee threatens to defame him in a tell-all book.

24.title: And the Window of Opportunity
24.plot: As Caroline and Max deep-clean part of the diner for Han before a health inspection, they make a discovery that could help relaunch their cupcake business; Sophie and Oleg break up after he cheats on her.

1.title: And the Soft Opening
1.plot: In the third season premiere, business booms for Max and Caroline's new cupcake walk-up window when word spreads about a shocking incident involving a rock star.

2.title: And the Kickstarter
2.plot: Caroline tries to raise money for an expensive pair of new pants through an online fundraising site. Meanwhile, Max's new smartphone comes between her and Caroline.

3.title: And the Kitty Kitty Spank Spank
3.plot: When Max becomes smitten with an old stray cat that's been hanging around the apartment, Caroline tries to convince her they need to find it a better home. But just when they think they've found one, the cat's fate takes a turn.

4.title: And the Group Head
4.plot: When Max and Caroline can't figure out how to use the new cappuccino maker they bought for their cupcake business, they take temporary side jobs as baristas at a coffee house to learn the ropes.

5.title: And the Cronuts
5.plot: When Max and Caroline start losing business to the new "cronut" craze (half-croissant, half-donut), they come up with their own trend: cake fries.

6.title: And the Piece of Sheet
6.plot: After Caroline buys hair extensions with her and Max's joint funds, Caroline feels guilty and splurges on a new bedding set for Max. But she gives the old set to charity, not realizing Max's old pillowcase has sentimental value for her, and the two go to extremes in search of Max's cherished pillowcase.

7.title: And the Girlfriend Experience
7.plot: After Han emails photos of a stripper's face to his mother in Korea with the claim that she's his girlfriend, he begs Max and Caroline to find the woman and convince her to play his girlfriend when his mother visits.

8.title: And the 'It' Hole
8.plot: When Caroline's date doesn't show up after promising to take her to one of the city's hippest new restaurants, she and Max decide to take advantage of the hard-to-get reservation.

9.title: And the Pastry Porn
9.plot: Max decides to apply to the Manhattan School of Pastry and bakes a tart for her entrance exam.

10.title: And the First Day of School
10.plot: Max attempts to make a good impression on her first day of pastry school, but finds the class clown to be extremely distracting - and intriguing. Meanwhile, Caroline dresses to impress Max's handsome teacher, Nicolas.

11.title: And the Life After Death
11.plot: Caroline learns that her childhood nanny passed away and brings Max with her to attend the funeral. But once there, she discovers that the woman never spoke of Caroline to her own family.

12.title: And the French Kiss
12.plot: After Caroline has an incredible make-out session with Max's pastry school teacher, Chef Nicholas (recurring guest star GILLES MARINI), Caroline finds out something that makes her wish it never happened.

13.title: And the Big But
13.plot: Max finds herself wanting to be more than just friends with her pastry school partner, Deke. Meanwhile, Caroline is "hot for teacher" - the married Chef Nicholas.

14.title: And the Dumpster Sex
14.plot: When Deke takes Max to his place after a great first date, his "home" is nothing like she expected. Meanwhile, Caroline feels empowered - then scared for her life - after having a suspicious car towed from in front of their cupcake store.

15.title: And the Icing on the Cake
15.plot: When Deke (recurring guest star ERIC ANDRÃ%) invites Max's friends over for a gathering at his dumpster, Caroline learns an enormous secret about his background.

16.title: And the ATM
16.plot: Max decides to break up with Deke (recurring guest star ERIC ANDRÃ%) now that she knows about his wealthy background.

17.title: And the Married Man Sleepover
17.plot: When Nicolas invites Caroline to a dinner date at his loft, she asks Max and Deke to join her to help make sure she doesn't do anything she might regret. Also, Max and Caroline treat themselves to very special hair appointments.

18.title: And the Near Death Experience
18.plot: Caroline goes into a tailspin and brings Max into the mix when Nicolas (recurring guest star GILLES MARINI) tells her he's going to leave his wife for her.

19.title: And the Kilt Trip
19.plot: Caroline tries to fit in with Max and the diner gang as they go out to get wild and crazy at the St. Patrick's Day parade, but she finds herself longing to practice her former holiday traditions at the Plaza Hotel.

20.title: And the Not Broke Parents
20.plot: When Deke invites Max and Caroline to join him and his parents for dinner at their home, Max is tongue-tied - until his mother confides in her about her secret past.

21.title: And the Wedding Cake Cake Cake
21.plot: A girl who likes Max's cupcakes hires Max to make her wedding cake. Max who is still reeling from her break up, is hesitant to do it. She does it but the bride is constantly changing her mind about the cake and her marriage.

22.title: And the New Lease on Life
22.plot: When Max and Caroline's rent controlled apartment's lease runs out they track down the original lease holder to stay with them for a day to renew the lease. But events turn south when the old man won't leave until he gets some action.

23.title: And the Free Money
23.plot: When Caroline and Max join Sophie at the racetrack as guests of Sophie's new bookie boyfriend, Caroline's reignited love for horse racing gets out of hand.

24.title: And the First Degree
24.plot: When Caroline discovers that Max didn't graduate high school by failing to show up for only one exam, she decides to help her best friend get her degree - and reconnect with her estranged mother.

1.title: And the Reality Problem
1.plot: A television producer approaches Max and Caroline about shooting an episode of a Kardashians' reality show at their cupcake window.

2.title: And the DJ Face
2.plot: Max is embarrassed when she discovers her Tuesday night boyfriend is a DJ at a grocery chain.

3.title: And the Childhood Not Included
3.plot: When Caroline accidentally loses Han's expensive fish while cleaning the tank, Max considers selling a sentimental gift she just received from her mother in order to pay for a new one.

4.title: And the Old Bike Yarn
4.plot: Caroline takes an abandoned bicycle in order to start a delivery service for their cupcake business, but discovers that Max never learned how to ride one.

5.title: And the Brand Job
5.plot: Max and Caroline's partnership - and friendship - is almost torn apart when Caroline drags Max to a seminar to help brand their cupcake business.

6.title: And the Model Apartment
6.plot: In an attempt to make some extra money, Max and Caroline decide to rent out their apartment on airbnb. Sophie finds new ways to test Oleg's faithfulness and commitment to their relationship.

7.title: And a Loan for Christmas
7.plot: Max and Caroline get a bank loan so they can mass-produce their cupcake T-shirts to sell at high-end boutiques. Sophie gets the diner gang to dress up for a holiday decorating contest.

8.title: And the Fun Factory
8.plot: Max and Caroline select a factory to produce their cupcake T-shirts, but become suspicious of the work conditions at the factory after meeting the overly enthusiastic employees.

9.title: And the Past and the Furious
9.plot: Caroline is shocked when she receives a Lamborghini for her birthday, which her father ordered for her four years ago. Meanwhile, Oleg has something big planned for Sophie.

10.title: And the Move-In Meltdown
10.plot: Max, Caroline, Earl and Han help Oleg move into Sophie's apartment - until she begins turning away all of his things.

11.title: And the Crime Ring
11.plot: Max and Caroline are arrested for breaking into a cute guy's apartment to recover the rings Caroline left behind after she spent the night.

12.title: And the Knock-Off Knockout
12.plot: Two high school prep teenagers create and sell imitations of Max and Caroline's cupcake T-shirts.

13.title: And the Great Unwashed
13.plot: A customer at the diner is revealed to be a successful photographer who has been keeping a secret.

14.title: And the Cupcake Captives
14.plot: Sophie's wedding shower is interrupted by a hostage situation. Max and Caroline's cupcake business gets unwanted attention when a tenant is arrested while wearing their company's T-shirt.

15.title: And the Fat Cat
15.plot: A handsome businessman, Owen, returns Max and Caroline's missing cat, Nancy, who comes home with a big surprise.

16.title: And the Zero Tolerance
16.plot: Max and Caroline get a second jobs at a trendy Manhattan restaurant as a pastry chef and hostess to help pay off their bank loan.

17.title: And the High Hook-Up
17.plot: Max pursues Nashit, a handsome new waiter at The High, despite Joe's "no hook-up" rule.

18.title: And the Taste Test
18.plot: When Sophie takes Max and Caroline shopping for their bridesmaids' dresses, the girls enlist the diner gang's help to hide the ugliest ones, in the hopes of avoiding complete and utter humiliation.

19.title: And the Look of the Irish
19.plot: Max and Caroline try to get Nash into the modeling business in an effort to bring in extra money acting as his managers. Also, Sophie and Oleg attempt to keep celibate for 30 days before their wedding.

20.title: And the Minor Problem
20.plot: Max and Caroline's attempt to break Nash into the modeling business comes to a screeching halt when his mother arrives from Ireland to retrieve her son.

21.title: And the Grate Expectations
21.plot: Max and Caroline help launch the new branch of The High at JFK airport, and Sophie discovers that Oleg may have an ulterior motive for wanting to marry her.

22.title: And the Disappointing Unit
22.plot: In the fourth season finale, Max and Caroline are tasked with retrieving Sophie's wedding dress from customs and safely transporting it to the church in time for her big wedding.

1.title: And the Wrecking Ball
1.plot: Max, Caroline, and the diner crew rally together, when the city seeks to demolish the diner and cupcake window to build an I-MAX theater. Meanwhile, believing she is an expectant mother, Sophie takes many pregnancy tests.

2.title: And the Gym and Juice
2.plot: Max and Caroline get part-time jobs at the juice bar at a gym to enjoy free use of the gym's locker room after their shower breaks; Caroline has a run-in with a group of rich moms who are jealous of the attention she's getting from a sexy trainer.

3.title: And the Maybe Baby
3.plot: When the girls run into Caroline's newly engaged ex, Andy, Caroline wonders if she made a mistake when she sees how much he supports his fiancé's career.

4.title: And the Inside-Outside Situation
4.plot: Max and Caroline's cupcake shop is boycotted after they refuse to sell cupcakes to an artist named "I", who wants to put cocktail weenies in them.

5.title: And the Escape Room
5.plot: Han insists the diner gang attends a mandatory night out in an "Escape Room Club" when he feels they aren't working together as a team, they soon find themselves locked inside the "Alice in Wonderland"-themed room.

6.title: And the Not Regular Down There
6.plot: Max is both puzzled and curious when the new guy she is dating expresses hesitations about intimacy because he is "not regular down there." Also, Sophie and Oleg struggle to get pregnant.

7.title: And the Coming Out Party
7.plot: Caroline's grandmother wakes from a coma and does not know that she and the rest of her family is broke. Caroline tries to ward off telling her the bad news by throwing her one last hurrah lunch with the help of Max and the gang.

8.title: And the Basketball Jones
8.plot: Oleg's pro-basketball playing cousin comes to town to play against Max's favorite team, but chaos ensues when the girls interfere with the game.

9.title: And the Sax Problem
9.plot: Max and Caroline try to convince Earl's ex girlfriend Ruby to let him play at her club with his former band.

10.title: And the No New Friends
10.plot: When Max reconnects with an old friend, Caroline feels jealous and attempts to try to make some new friends of her own.

11.title: And the Booth Babes
11.plot: Max and Caroline make a deal in order to get into a gaming convention, where they learn Han's friend has based video game characters on them.

12.title: And the Story Telling Show
12.plot: Caroline attracts the attention of a Hollywood executive when she shares her riches-to-rags tale at storytelling night; Sophie and Oleg look for a surrogate.

13.title: And the Lost Baggage
13.plot: Max tags along with Caroline as she travels to Los Angeles on a film studio's dime to discuss the idea of making her riches-to-rags life story into a movie. While there, Max loses her luggage but finds a new crush.

14.title: And You Bet Your Ass
14.plot: Caroline is torn when the studio writers reveal they won't portray Max in the project; Max is being spoiled by her new Hollywood beau, Randy, who sets Caroline up on a date with his friend, Bob.

15.title: And the Great Escape
15.plot: Max pet-sits Randy's dog, Bruno, who escapes with a cannibalistic serial killer loose in their neighborhood; Caroline sets up meetings with actresses who are interested in playing her.

16.title: And the Pity Party Bus
16.plot: Caroline signs the rights to her life story to be turned into a movie; Max is heartbroken when Randy breaks up with her via his therapist Elliot, Caroline rents a party bus in attempt to cheer her up.

17.title: And the Show and Don't Tell
17.plot: When the girls go to prison to see Caroline's father, Martin, perform in a musical, they tell him they plan to use Caroline's movie money to convert their cupcake window into a dessert bar.

18.title: And the Loophole
18.plot: When the girls decide to look for larger space for their dessert bar, Han sets them up Evie, a real estate agent who has a crush on him; Randy surprises Max at the diner hoping to patch up their relationship.

19.title: And the Attack of the Killer Apartment
19.plot: In an attempt to get to know Max's world better, Randy asks to spend the night at her apartment; Caroline works on getting a liquor license for their dessert bar.

20.title: And the Partnership Hits the Fan
20.plot: When a law firm courting Randy for a job invites him and Max to dinner at a hip new restaurant, the evening veers off course when their eclectic cuisine doesn't sit well with Max.

21.title: And the Ten Inches
21.plot: When Max and Caroline need more space for their renovated dessert bar, they're willing to do just about anything to convince Angie, the brash owner of the pizza place next door, to rent them her back office.

22.title: And the Big Gamble
22.plot: Max and Caroline learn Han is in trouble with a gang when he can't pay a substantial debt he amassed from gambling on Women's tennis.

locations: Stage 18, Warner Brothers Burbank Studios - 4000 Warner Boulevard, Burbank, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: Sassy, streetwise Max works two jobs just to get by, one of which is waiting tables during the night shift at the retro-hip Williamsburg Diner. Sophisticated Caroline is an uptown trust fund princess who's having a run of bad luck that forces her to reluctantly give waitressing a shot. At first, Max sees Caroline as yet another in a long line of inept servers she must cover for, but she's surprised to find that Caroline has as much substance as she does style. When Caroline discovers Max's knack for baking amazing cupcakes, she sees a lucrative future for them, but they first need to raise the start-up money.
imdb.title: 2 Broke Girls
plot: Two young women waitressing at a greasy spoon diner strike up an unlikely friendship in the hopes of launching a successful business - if only they can raise the cash.::CBS

Sassy, streetwise Max works two jobs just to get by, one of which is waiting tables during the night shift at the retro-hip Williamsburg Diner. Sophisticated Caroline is an uptown trust fund princess who's having a run of bad luck that forces her to reluctantly give waitressing a shot. At first, Max sees Caroline as yet another in a long line of inept servers she must cover for, but she's surprised to find that Caroline has as much substance as she does style. When Caroline discovers Max's knack for baking amazing cupcakes, she sees a lucrative future for them, but they first need to raise the start-up money.::CBS

camera: Sony CineAlta HDW-F900, Panavision Primo Lenses
laboratory: Warner Bros. Motion Picture Imaging, Burbank (CA), USA (digital intermediate)
